snippet: The agreement was a clear sign that North and South Korea were easing tensions and moving toward a thaw after years of recriminations that hit a peak earlier this year.
abstract: North and South Korea agree to hold high-level government talks to discuss reversing recent suspension of their joint operation of industrial complex in border town, as well as other economic and humanitarian projects that have faltered over years due to tension between countries.
lead_paragraph: The agreement was a clear sign that North and South Korea were easing tensions and moving toward a thaw after years of recriminations that hit a peak earlier this year.

headline.seo: North and South Korea to Discuss Restoring Economic and Other Ties
headline.main: Two Koreas to Discuss Restoring Economic Ties
headline.print_headline: 2 Koreas Agree to Discuss Restoring Economic and Other Ties as Strains Ease
